fields.headline: Valentine getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 A dinner cruise on the River Thames plus B&B at the four-star London Bridge Hotel costs £119. Available on 14 or 15 February through The Hotel Directory (08707 708181). Two nights at the secluded Kinloch Lodge hotel on Skye, two hours' drive from Inverness, is £190, including dinner on both evenings. Phone the hotel direct on 01471 833214. Under £300 Two nights B&B at the renowned five-star La Plaza Hotel in Brussels plus flowers, champagne chocolates and travel by Eurostar costs £229. Depart on 14 or 15 February with ShortBreaks (020 8402 0007). Late check-out on departure day if you overdo the celebrations. Perfection is Paris, staying at the Hotel de Vigny. The cost for two for the night of 14 February is €420 (£278), with continental breakfast, champagne, dinner, two tickets to the Arc de Triomphe but not travel. Call the hotel: 00 33 1 42 99 80 80. Budapest for stressed-out lovers: Thermalia Travel (020 7483 1898) has two nights' half-board at the four-star Thermal Hotel Helia, with use of spa facilities, for £270, including flights and transfers. Over £1,000 Sample Moroccan decadence with Worldwide Journeys (020 7386 4646). Three nights at Jnane Tamsna, a luxury Marrakech Medina villa costs £1,038, with full board, flights, transfers, two half-day excursions and two massages. Leave13 February. All prices are per person unless indicated. Web exlusives Grace and timeless beauty in Venice with three nights from 14 February at the central two star Hotel Rio. Flights are from Heathrow, Gatwick or Birmingham (other airports available for supplement) with Eurobreak (020 8780 7700). £255 covers all. Get steamy at One Spa (0131 221 7777) at the Sheraton Grand Hotel in Edinburgh with a special half-day Surreal Serenity package for £95 per couple. Try the mud chamber followed by a rock and bio-sauna, tropical showers and swim in the rooftop hydropool. Available between 13 and 16 February. London treat of two nights at the four star Berners Hotel off Oxford Street plus top price tickets to see Phantom of the Opera on Valentine's night. The price is £176 including breakfast with Theatrebreak (01904 644455). Three night price of £543 departing 13 February to Le Mas Candille, Mougins, near Cannes. The hotel has a Shiseido spa and Japanese garden set in the hills above Cannes half an hour's drive from Nice airport. Includes breakfast, flights and car hire. French Expressions (020 7431 1312). Cox and Kings (020 7873 5000) have three nights B&B at the Villa Des Orangers, a traditional Moroccan riad house in Marrakech. The cost is £625 departing 13 February inclusive of flights. The five star London Carlton Tower Hotel in Knightsbridge has teamed up with Agent Provocateur. Stay minimum two nights in a deluxe room for £130 per person per night on 14 and 15 February and your treat will also include Bulgari bathroom amenities, champagne, a £50 Agent Provocateur lingerie voucher, dinner for two at Grissini Restaurant on the 14 February, free parking and breakfasts. Call hotel direct (020 7235 1234).
